Package galaxy.io

Class Summary
GalaxyInputStream This class provides methods for reading data from a Galaxy Communicator connection.
GalaxyOutputStream This class provides methods for writing data to a Galaxy Communicator connection.
Util Utility class for I/O classes.
XdrInBuffer This class reads data from a XDR-encoded byte array or input stream.
XdrOutBuffer This class writes data to a XDR-encoded byte array.
 

Exception Summary
EOTException  
NotGalaxyStreamable  
NotSupportedException
